name: Ortenheim.github.com
body:
### Learnings about system development
Here I will rant about user experiences in admin systems. 
* How to successfully work with outsourcing development abroad and in-house? Lessons learned. 
* What are effective ways to document system architecture and specs for software requirements?
* What is important when thinking about user experiences?
* Hosting, linux and git. How to deploy your applications?
* What are future technologies to look out for?
* Tips and tricks about Tools and libraries
